summary: Flight record management app where update, edit, and delete functionality for flight records needs to be fixed.
known_issues: Flight record update, change, and delete operations are not working correctly

existing_features.title: Fix the edit/update mutation for flight log entries so that submitting the EditFlightEntryModal successfully updates the record in the backend and reflects the change in the UI without errors.
Fix the delete operation for flight log entries so that confirming deletion in the FlightRecordsTable confirmation dialog successfully removes the record from the backend and updates the table.

new_feature_requests.summary: Audit and fix the backend Motoko actor flight log entry update and delete functions to ensure they correctly identify entries by ID, apply changes, and return appropriate success/error responses.
